english.segment1: Take me and invade me. Make me someone new. Wake me from the dead. And break me with the truth
english.segment2: Move me and disturb me. Interrupt my peace. Tear open my heart. And pull me to my knees
english.segment3: There's a world outside. That is burning. While I'm turning blinded eyes. While I stand by
english.segment4: I won't survive. To live this ordinary life. I'm not alive. To live this ordinary life
english.segment5: And I will try. To see this world I live in. With Your eyes. To love this world You've given. With my life. To see this world I live in. With Your eyes. To love this world You've given. With my life
